channel.title: Delta control panel
channel.description:
So i was bored, and i was using a gui maker (Graphical user interface) and i decided to make a control panel, its so likely that it wont work with your server because you will have to adjust the imports and methods, but if you need any help you can ask me ;).
First a picture on what you're adding. [img]http://i44.tinypic.com/b7mkyd.png[/img]
Now download the 4 files from uppit. http://uppit.com/r896tnc29sv0/controlpanel.rar
After you downloaded them, extract them in your util package, after that call in your server main method the controlpanel main method, and that will initialize the controlpanel.
